channel.title: I need help adding PvP drops!
channel.description:
I need help adding PvP drops.
Like Runescape, getting Vesta, Statius and the Artefacts as very uncommon drops, I have the models in my client, I know the ID's, all I need to know is how to make them low drop rate rewards from killing PLAYERS :D.
Will rep++

item.title: I need help adding PvP drops!
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

Sorry, my base is Project Insanity.

[quote=“Ashton51, post:3, topic:371178”][quote author=dancey88 link=topic=467259.msg3416687#msg3416687 date=1291150745]

	int[] PvPDrops = {15037,15038,15039,13899,13902,13896,13739,13734,13877,13893,13905,13884,13890,13858,13861,13864};
	int[] GoodDrops = {14892,14891,14890,14889,14888,14887,14886,14885,14884,14883,14882,14881,14880,14879,14879,14878,14877,14876};
	int[] FoodDrops = {2550,391,385,379,361,139};
	int[] MedDrops = {6737,6735,6733,15272,11128,658511732,4151,4716,4718,4720,4722,4724,4726,4728,4730,4732,4734,4736,4708,4710,4712,4714,4740,4741,4743,4745,4747,4749,4751,5753,4755,4757,4759};
	int[] LowDrops = {3751,10828,4091,4093,4101,4103,4111,4113,4131,1079,1127,1713,385,391,361,139};

	public int randomDrop() {
		return PvPDrops[(int) (Math.random() * PvPDrops.length)];
	}
	public int FoodDrop() {
		return FoodDrops[(int) (Math.random() * FoodDrops.length)];
	}
	public int LowDrop() {
		return LowDrops[(int) (Math.random() * LowDrops.length)];
	}
	public int MedDrop() {
		return MedDrops[(int) (Math.random() * MedDrops.length)];
	}
	public int GoodDrop() {
		return GoodDrops[(int) (Math.random() * GoodDrops.length)];
	}
	public int WepDrop() {
		return c.playerWeapon;
	}

add this into TtemAssistant.java
[/quote]

That is part of it,

But not even close to all of it.[/quote]

If that’s not all of it, tell me what is?

Still need help!

Read full topic
item.source: I need help adding PvP drops!
